name: Cat-Saving Werewolf
description:
Try to save as many cats as you can, while uncontrollably transforming into a werewolf!

Sorry we did not add sound, but you can open the music in a separate window if you like: https://soundcloud.com/olegklishin/cat-saving-werewolf

=====

WASD to move around in human form (wolf can't move)

LEFT CLICK to pick up and throw objects in human form

LEFT CLICK to attack in wolf form

=====

Throw kittens into a window to “save” them.

=====

A game by:

Andrej Suvorau — code

Alexey Novodvorsky — game design

Oleg Klishin — art, music

Made for Ludum Dare 49
